table.name: vtiger_labelmanager
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_labelmanager` ( `labelmanagerid` int NOT NULL, `labelmanager_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`labelmanagerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_labelmanagercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_labelmanagercf` ( `labelmanagerid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`labelmanagerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
